mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENTS (M_IDX, C_CONTENT, B_IDX, U_IDX, C_REGDATE) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(M_IDX),0)+1 FROM COMMENTS), #{cContent}, #{bIdx}, #{uIdx}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMENTS SET C_CONTENT = #{cContent} WHERE M_IDX = #{mIdx}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM COMMENTS WHERE B_IDX = #{bIdx} ORDER BY M_IDX DESC
